display_long_description:
Welcome to XR Ultra Physics Sandbox VR – the ultimate destruction playground built for Quest 3!
Enter a fully interactive, physics-driven world with 165 weapons, 117 destructibles, and 34 types of bots, all powered by lifelike ragdoll physics and immersive VR mechanics.

🔫 165 Weapon Types
Ancient & Medieval: Swords, shields, maces

Vintage: Classic firearms and explosives

Modern: Military-grade rifles, shotguns, grenades

Melee, Ranged & Explosive: Master every combat style

💥 Total Destruction Playground
52 destructible types: Smash with precision

65 prefab combos (large-scale destruction)

30 prefab combos (target challenges & mini-setups)

🤖 34 Types of Bots (with AI & Ragdoll Reactions)
Fight bots that dodge, chase, punch, or react to thrown objects

Experience hilarious, satisfying VR ragdoll physics

🧠 Why Play XR Ultra Physics Sandbox?
Huge variety of tools, enemies, and maps

Endless replayability with realistic object interaction

Mixed Reality Mode coming soon!

Step into XR Ultra Physics Sandbox VR and transform your environment into a physics-driven combat lab. Smash, experiment, or unleash chaos—this is not just a game, it's your VR playground.
